  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  useEffect(() => {

  useEffect(() => {

      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {

    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';

'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function DesignShelf() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [currentBanner, setCurrentBanner] = useState(0);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  const banners = [
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner5.jpg", alt: "ã‚»ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner2.jpg", alt: "ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼2", link: "/designshelf" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner3.jpg", alt: "ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼3", link: "/designshelf" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner4.jpg", alt: "ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼4", link: "/designshelf" }
  ];

  // ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚»ãƒ«ã®è‡ªå‹•åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      setCurrentBanner((prev) => (prev + 1) % banners.length);
    }, 5000);
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [banners.length]);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();

  useEffect(() => {

      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();

  useEffect(() => {

  // ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚»ãƒ«ã®è‡ªå‹•åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      setCurrentBanner((prev) => (prev + 1) % banners.length);
    }, 5000);
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [banners.length]);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {

  }, [banners.length]);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();

    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {

  useEffect(() => {

'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function DesignShelf() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [currentBanner, setCurrentBanner] = useState(0);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  const banners = [
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner5.jpg", alt: "ã‚»ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner2.jpg", alt: "ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼2", link: "/designshelf" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner3.jpg", alt: "ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼3", link: "/designshelf" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner4.jpg", alt: "ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼4", link: "/designshelf" }
  ];

  // ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼ã”ã¨ã®ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒšã‚¯ãƒˆæ¯”ï¼ˆç”»åƒèª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿æ™‚ã«æ›´æ–°ï¼‰ã€‚åˆæœŸå€¤ã¯ 1200/500 ã‚’ä»®ç½®ã
  const [bannerRatios, setBannerRatios] = useState<number[]>(() => banners.map(() => 1200 / 500));

  // ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚»ãƒ«ã®è‡ªå‹•åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      setCurrentBanner((prev) => (prev + 1) % banners.length);
    }, 5000);
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [banners.length]);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  const [bannerRatios, setBannerRatios] = useState<number[]>(() => banners.map(() => 1200 / 500));

  useEffect(() => {

  useEffect(() => {

  const products = [

      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

    if (product) {

      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);

  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : product.designImage);
      setIsZoomed(false);

  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {

  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  };

      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }

    setPopupImage(null);

  useEffect(() => {

```typescriptreact
'use client';
export const revalidate = 0;

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);

  useEffect(() => {

      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

  useEffect(() => {

'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {

  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {

    features: string[];

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {

      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';

  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);

      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }

  useEffect(() => {

      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);

    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));

    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : type === 'design' ? product.designImage : (product.modelImage ?? product.image));
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };
